filters.name: CertificateCreationRequested
filters.description: Custom class used to create certificate creation filters and its custom methods.

arguments.name: user
arguments.description: is a Django User object.

arguments.name: course_key
arguments.description: course key associated with the certificate.

arguments.name: mode
arguments.description: mode of the certificate.

arguments.name: status
arguments.description: status of the certificate.

arguments.name: grade
arguments.description: user's grade in this course run.

arguments.name: generation_mode
arguments.description: Options are "self" (implying the user generated the cert themself) and "batch"

exceptions.name: PreventCertificateCreation
exceptions.description: Custom class used to stop the certificate creation process.

filters.name: CertificateRenderStarted
filters.description: Custom class used to create certificate render filters and its custom methods.

arguments.name: context
arguments.description: context dictionary for certificate template.

arguments.name: custom_template
arguments.description: edxapp object representing custom web

exceptions.name: RedirectToPage
exceptions.description: Custom class used to stop the certificate rendering process.

exceptions.name: RenderAlternativeInvalidCertificate
exceptions.description: Custom class used to stop the certificate rendering process.

exceptions.name: RenderCustomResponse
exceptions.description: Custom class used to stop the certificate rendering process.

filters.name: CohortAssignmentRequested
filters.description: Custom class used to create cohort assignment filters and its custom methods.

arguments.name: user
arguments.description: is a Django User object to be added in the cohort.

arguments.name: target_cohort
arguments.description: edxapp object representing the new user's cohort.

exceptions.name: PreventCohortAssignment
exceptions.description: Custom class used to stop the cohort assignment process.

filters.name: CohortChangeRequested
filters.description: Custom class used to create cohort change filters and its custom methods.

arguments.name: current_membership
arguments.description: edxapp object representing the user's cohort

arguments.name: target_cohort
arguments.description: edxapp object representing the new user's cohort.

exceptions.name: PreventCohortChange
exceptions.description: Custom class used to stop the cohort change process.

filters.name: CourseAboutPageURLRequested
filters.description: Custom class used to get course about page url filters and its custom methods.

arguments.name: url
arguments.description: the URL of the page to be modified.

arguments.name: org
arguments.description: Course org filter used as context data to get LMS configurations.

filters.name: CourseAboutRenderStarted
filters.description: Custom class used to create course about render filters and its custom methods.

arguments.name: context
arguments.description: context dictionary for course about template.

arguments.name: template_name
arguments.description: template name to be rendered by the course about.

exceptions.name: RedirectToPage
exceptions.description: Custom class used to stop the course about rendering process.

exceptions.name: RenderInvalidCourseAbout
exceptions.description: Custom class used to stop the course about rendering process.

exceptions.name: RenderCustomResponse
exceptions.description: Custom class used to stop the course about rendering process.

filters.name: CourseEnrollmentQuerysetRequested
filters.description: Custom class used to create course enrollments queryset filters and its custom methods.

arguments.name: enrollments
arguments.description: data with all user's course enrollments

exceptions.name: PreventEnrollmentQuerysetRequest
exceptions.description: Custom class used to stop the course enrollment queryset request process.

filters.name: CourseEnrollmentStarted
filters.description: Custom class used to create enrollment filters and its custom methods.

arguments.name: user
arguments.description: is a Django User object.

arguments.name: course_key
arguments.description: course key associated with the enrollment.

arguments.name: mode
arguments.description: is a string specifying what kind of enrollment.

exceptions.name: PreventEnrollment
exceptions.description: Custom class used to stop the enrollment process.

filters.name: CourseHomeUrlCreationStarted
filters.description: Custom class used to create filters to act on course home url creation.

arguments.name: course_key
arguments.description: The course key for which the home url is being requested.

arguments.name: course_home_url
arguments.description: The url string for the course home

filters.name: CourseUnenrollmentStarted
filters.description: Custom class used to create unenrollment filters and its custom methods.

arguments.name: enrollment
arguments.description: edxapp object representing course enrollments.

exceptions.name: PreventUnenrollment
exceptions.description: Custom class used to stop the unenrollment process.

filters.name: DashboardRenderStarted
filters.description: Custom class used to create dashboard render filters and its custom methods.

arguments.name: context
arguments.description: context dictionary for student's dashboard template.

arguments.name: template_name
arguments.description: template name to be rendered by the student's dashboard.

exceptions.name: RedirectToPage
exceptions.description: Custom class used to stop the dashboard rendering process.

exceptions.name: RenderInvalidDashboard
exceptions.description: Custom class used to stop the dashboard render process.

exceptions.name: RenderCustomResponse
exceptions.description: Custom class used to stop the dashboard rendering process.

filters.name: CourseRunAPIRenderStarted
filters.description: Custom class used to create filters for course run data.

arguments.name: serialized_courserun
arguments.description: courserun data

filters.name: CourseEnrollmentAPIRenderStarted
filters.description: Custom class used to create filters for enrollment data.

arguments.name: course_key
arguments.description: The course key for which isStarted is being modify.

arguments.name: serialized_enrollment
arguments.description: enrollment data

filters.name: IDVPageURLRequested
filters.description: Custom class used to create filters to act on ID verification page URL requests.

arguments.name: url
arguments.description: The url for the ID verification page to be modified.

filters.name: InstructorDashboardRenderStarted
filters.description: Custom class used to create instructor dashboard filters and its custom methods.

arguments.name: context
arguments.description: context dictionary for instructor's tab template.

arguments.name: template_name
arguments.description: template name to be rendered by the instructor's tab.

exceptions.name: RedirectToPage
exceptions.description: Custom class used to stop the instructor dashboard render by redirecting to a new page.

exceptions.name: RenderInvalidDashboard
exceptions.description: Custom class used to render a custom template instead of the instructor dashboard.

exceptions.name: RenderCustomResponse
exceptions.description: Custom class used to stop the instructor dashboard rendering by returning a custom response.

filters.name: ORASubmissionViewRenderStarted
filters.description: Custom class used to create ORA submission view filters and its custom methods.

arguments.name: context
arguments.description: context dictionary for submission view template.

arguments.name: template_name
arguments.description: template name to be rendered by the student's dashboard.

exceptions.name: RenderInvalidTemplate
exceptions.description: Custom class used to stop the submission view render process.

filters.name: StudentLoginRequested
filters.description: Custom class used to create login filters and its custom methods.

arguments.name: user
arguments.description: is a Django User object.

exceptions.name: PreventLogin
exceptions.description: Custom class used to stop the login process.

filters.name: AccountSettingsRenderStarted
filters.description: Custom class used to create Account settings filters.

arguments.name: context
arguments.description: template context for the account settings page.

arguments.name: template_name
arguments.description: template path used to render the account settings page.

exceptions.name: RedirectToPage
exceptions.description: Custom class used to redirect before the account settings rendering process.

exceptions.name: RenderInvalidAccountSettings
exceptions.description: Custom class used to stop the account settings rendering process.

exceptions.name: RenderCustomResponse
exceptions.description: Custom class used to stop the account settings rendering process and return a custom response.

filters.name: VerticalBlockChildRenderStarted
filters.description: Custom class used to create vertical block children's render filters.

arguments.name: block
arguments.description: the XBlock that is about to be rendered into HTML

arguments.name: context
arguments.description: rendering context values like is_mobile_app, show_title..etc

exceptions.name: PreventChildBlockRender
exceptions.description: Custom class used to stop a particular child block from being rendered.

filters.name: VerticalBlockRenderCompleted
filters.description: Custom class used to create filters to act on vertical block rendering completed.

arguments.name: block
arguments.description: The VeriticalBlock instance which is being rendered

arguments.name: fragment
arguments.description: The web-fragment containing the rendered content of VerticalBlock

arguments.name: context
arguments.description: rendering context values like is_mobile_app, show_title..etc.,

arguments.name: view
arguments.description: the rendering view. Can be either 'student_view', or 'public_view'

exceptions.name: PreventVerticalBlockRender
exceptions.description: Custom class used to prevent the vertical block from rendering for the user.

filters.name: RenderXBlockStarted
filters.description: Filter in between context generation and rendering of XBlock scope.

arguments.name: context
arguments.description: rendering context values like is_mobile_app, show_title, etc.

arguments.name: student_view_context
arguments.description: context passed to the student_view of the block context

exceptions.name: PreventXBlockBlockRender
exceptions.description: Custom class used to prevent the XBlock from rendering for the user.

exceptions.name: RenderCustomResponse
exceptions.description: Custom class used to stop the XBlock rendering process and return a custom response.
